metadata.dc:author: M Martínez Cereijo, J
Alvarez Escudero, J
Tubio Pose, A
Taboada Muñiz, M
Calvo Rey, A
Ferreiroa Mosquera, E
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of a 35-years-old man who presented a massive haemothorax and hypovolemic shock following cardiac surgery, from spontaneous rupture of a phrenic artery. A quick diagnosis and immediate intervention is crucial to manage the patient.
metadata.dc:subject: Hemotórax
Phrenic artery
Cirugía cardiaca
Haemothorax
Arteria frénica
Cardiac surgery
metadata.dc:title: Hemotórax masivo derecho por rotura espontánea idiopática de una arteria frénica tras cirugía cardiaca.
Massive right hemothorax due to idiopathic spontaneous rupture of a phrenic artery following cardiac surgery.
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de anestesiologia y reanimacion
